summary.span: 表示用于使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 代码和/或 XAML 标记开发的工作流的编译器。

span.span: Represents the compiler for workflows that are developed using C# or Visual Basic code and/or XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例并运行 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class and run the method. 代码还创建 类的新实例并设置它的一些值。The code also creates a new instance of the class and sets some of its values. 此代码假定 `results` 的类型为 。This code assumes that `results` is of type . 此代码示例摘自 WizardForm.cs 文件中的 Outlook 工作流向导 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK sample from the WizardForm.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Outlook 工作流向导](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408). MemberSignature.Value: public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults Compile (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters parameters, params string[] files);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults Compile(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters parameters, string[] files) cil managed
Public Function Compile (parameters As WorkflowCompilerParameters, ParamArray files As String()) As WorkflowCompilerResults

param.name: files
param.span: 包含指向要编译的文件的路径的字符串数组。

span.span: A string array that contains the paths to the files to compile.

param.span: 这些文件可以是代码文件（比如 .vb 或 .cs），也可以是工作流标记文件。

span.span: These files can be either code files (such as .vb or .cs) or workflow markup files.

param.span: 工作流标记文件的扩展名必须是 .xoml，以便于编译器识别。

span.span: Workflow markup files must have an .xoml extension to be recognized by the compiler.

summary.span: 编译基于 作为参数传递的文件中包含的工作流的列表。

span.span: Compiles a list of workflows contained in the files that are passed as parameters based on the .
The representing the results of the operation.
